div.p: M77/4444, unit 939, VPRS 3991/P inward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria.

I have the honor to solicit, that the sum of £1800 may be placed on the public works estimate for the new financial year to provide buildings for my Department. The sum of £900 for building purposes on this years estimate has been saved; therefore only in reality for a similar new sum being asked, with a view that the two united amounts may enable me to obtain a proper building for my departmental use. This after all would furnish only limited building accommodation as compared to that of all other Departments
